thread.title: Best hotel in Manhattan for the money-bar none!
thread.title_full: Best hotel in Manhattan for the money-bar none! - Review of Holiday Inn Express New York City Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Robert G
title: Best hotel in Manhattan for the money-bar none!
text:
Newly renovated hotel, very comfortable king size room, superb full breakfast, and a very friendly and helpful staff. The price for this experience in the Times Square area, less than $125/night. It is the best deal in Manhattan I have found, if anyone can beat it, let the world know.
Room Tip: we had an upper floor,22, with about 6 rooms per floor. Very quiet See more room tips Green Features: Holiday Inn is known for their environmental friendly practice and this hotel meets and exceeds this standard
